name: Naarm/Melbourne Invasion Day Rally
description: Gather in the heart of Naarm/Melbourne at Parliament House for a powerful Invasion Day rally. We stand together to honor the Kulin nations, demand justice for First Nations peoples, and march for truth-telling and treaty rights that will heal our shared future.

name: Magandjin/Brisbane Invasion Day March
description: Join the Magandjin/Brisbane Invasion Day March starting at Queens Gardens. We march to acknowledge the Turrbal and Yuggera peoples' enduring connection to country, protest colonial injustices, and call for genuine treaty negotiations that respect Indigenous sovereignty.

name: Gadigal land/Sydney Invasion Day Rally
description: Come together on Gadigal land/Sydney at Hyde Park for Invasion Day. We honor the Gadigal people's ancient custodianship of this harbor city, stand against ongoing dispossession, and rally for the Uluru Statement from the Heart to be implemented through genuine treaty processes.

name: Nipaluna/Hobart Invasion Day Rally
description: March through Nipaluna/Hobart from 198 Elizabeth Street to demand justice for Palawa peoples. We stand in solidarity against the ongoing impacts of colonization on Tasmania's First Nations communities, calling for truth-telling about the Black Wars and meaningful treaty arrangements.

name: Tarndanyangga/Adelaide Invasion Day Rally
description: Gather at Victoria Square in Tarndanyangga/Adelaide to honor the Kaurna people's deep spiritual connection to this land. We rally against the ongoing erasure of Indigenous cultures, demand accountability for colonial violence, and call for treaty processes that restore Kaurna self-determination.

name: Boorloo/Perth Invasion Day Rally
description: Stand together at Forrest Place in Boorloo/Perth to acknowledge the Whadjuk Noongar people's ancient sovereignty over this land. We march against the ongoing impacts of colonial expansion, demand justice for the Stolen Generations, and rally for treaty agreements that honor Noongar rights and knowledge.
